system.admin: Can operate all system resources, users, tenants

tenant.admin: Can operate all resources under the tenant
tenant.normal: Can only see projects in which you are involved

project.admin: Can operate on all resources under items
project.dev: Only environments where research and development attributes can be operated
project.test: Only environments where test properties can be performed

environment.reader: Only resources in environment can be viewed

mesh.admin: Can operate resources under microservice virtual space
mesh.normal: View resources under Microservice Virtual Space
